statements: SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_resources;
SELECT id, video_url FROM virtual_classroom_resources WHERE id = 1;
SELECT presentation_url FROM virtual_classroom_resources WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_resources WHERE video_url IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, interactive_tool_url FROM virtual_classroom_resources WHERE interactive_tool_url LIKE '%app%';
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_resources WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, video_url FROM virtual_classroom_resources WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_resources WHERE id BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, presentation_url FROM virtual_classroom_resources WHERE video_url IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT video_url FROM virtual_classroom_resources WHERE presentation_url LIKE '%slides%';
SELECT * FROM videos;
SELECT title, duration FROM videos WHERE duration > 10;
SELECT title, uploaded_date FROM videos ORDER BY uploaded_date DESC;
SELECT presenter_name FROM presentations WHERE slides > 20;
SELECT presentation_id, title, presenter_name FROM presentations ORDER BY presentation_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE duration > 10 ORDER BY uploaded_date DESC;
SELECT title, duration FROM videos WHERE title LIKE '%fun%' ORDER BY duration;
SELECT * FROM presentations WHERE slides > 20 ORDER BY presentation_id ASC;
SELECT presenter_name, title FROM presentations WHERE slides = 10 ORDER BY presenter_name DESC;
SELECT video_id, title FROM videos WHERE duration BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY video_id;
SELECT * FROM videos;
SELECT video_name, video_url FROM videos WHERE video_id = 1;
SELECT presentation_title FROM presentations ORDER BY presentation_id DESC;
SELECT tool_name, tool_description FROM interactive_tools WHERE tool_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE video_name LIKE '%tutorial%' ORDER BY video_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE video_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY video_id DESC;
SELECT video_name, video_url FROM videos WHERE video_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT presentation_title AS title, presentation_file_path AS file FROM presentations WHERE presentation_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM interactive_tools WHERE tool_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY tool_name ASC;
SELECT tool_name, tool_description FROM interactive_tools WHERE tool_id > 3 ORDER BY tool_id;
SELECT * FROM videos;
SELECT video_title, video_url FROM videos WHERE video_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT presentation_title FROM presentations ORDER BY presentation_title DESC;
SELECT tool_name, tool_description FROM interactive_tools WHERE tool_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT resource_type, resource_name FROM classroom_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Document';
SELECT video_id, video_title FROM videos WHERE video_id = '123-456-789'
SELECT presentation_id, presentation_title FROM presentations WHERE presentation_title LIKE '%Database%'
SELECT tool_id, tool_description FROM interactive_tools ORDER BY tool_name DESC
SELECT * FROM videos JOIN presentations ON videos.video_id = presentations.video_id
SELECT tool_id, tool_name, tool_description FROM interactive_tools WHERE tool_name LIKE '%analysis%'
SELECT * FROM videos;
SELECT video_title, video_url FROM videos ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT presenter_id, presentation_title FROM presentations WHERE upload_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT tool_name, tool_type FROM interactive_tools WHERE tool_type = 'visualization';
SELECT video_title, video_url FROM videos WHERE uploader_id = 123 ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT presenter_id, presentation_title, upload_date FROM presentations WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01' AND upload_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY upload_date ASC;
SELECT tool_name, tool_type, tool_url FROM interactive_tools WHERE tool_type = 'Software' ORDER BY tool_name;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT u.username, access_level, t.tool_name FROM users u JOIN user_access ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id JOIN interactive_tools t ON ua.resource_id = t.tool_id WHERE ua.access_level = 'Admin';
